GPMC_Transaction_s Struct Reference

A GPMC_Transaction data structure is used with GPMC_transfer(). More...

#include <GPMC.h>

Detailed Description

A GPMC_Transaction data structure is used with GPMC_transfer().

Field Documentation

void* GPMC_Transaction_s::arg

Argument to be passed to the callback function

uint32_t GPMC_Transaction_s::count

Number of bytes for this transaction

uint32_t GPMC_Transaction_s::offset

offset address of the memory device

void* GPMC_Transaction_s::rxBuf

void * to a buffer to receive data

GPMC_TransactionStatus GPMC_Transaction_s::status

Status code set by GPMC_transfer

GPMC_TransactionType GPMC_Transaction_s::transType

transaction type

void* GPMC_Transaction_s::txBuf

void * to a buffer with data to be transmitted
